text: Oasis Founder @SteveChalke and @RealGeoffBarton on @BBCBreakfast this morning, talking about the pressures on schools. We are calling for all school staff to be prioritised, along with NHS & care staff, for the #vaccine. Please add your support at https://t.co/x2Vu0JcWim #covid19 https://t.co/qtOlKVu3cf
